source:
%%sql
-- Create the table directly in odw_meta_db
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_meta_db.config_curated_to_mipins
(
    -- Short code for the entity (unique)
    entity_code              STRING,

    -- Where to read from (curated side)
    source_table_name        STRING,

    -- Where to write to (MiPINS side)
    target_table_name        STRING,

    -- Value used in [Audit].[usp_addETLLog].Source
    log_source               STRING,

    -- Prefix for Description in logs
    log_description_prefix   STRING,

    -- Optional: passed to [Live].[upd_dim_source_system].source_system
    source_system_for_dim    STRING,

    -- Whether to call [Live].[upd_dim_source_system]
    enable_dim_source_update BOOLEAN,

    -- Optional: control ordering and activation
    execution_order          INT,
    is_active                BOOLEAN
)
USING DELTA;

%%sql

INSERT INTO odw_meta_db.config_curated_to_mipins (
    entity_code,
    source_table_name,
    target_table_name,
    log_source,
    log_description_prefix,
    source_system_for_dim,
    enable_dim_source_update,
    execution_order,
    is_active
)
VALUES
-- 1. pln_copy_appeal_s78_curated_mipins
(
  'appeal_s78',                                     -- entity_code
  'odw_curated_db.appeals_s78_curated_mipins',      -- source_table_name (from curated table list)
  'odw.appeals_s78_curated_mipins',                 -- target_table_name (preCopyScript)
  'appeal_s78',                                     -- log_source
  'appeal_s78_curated_mipins',                      -- log_description_prefix
  'Back Office-s78',                                -- source_system_for_dim
  true,                                             -- enable_dim_source_update
  10,                                               -- execution_order
  true                                              -- is_active
),

-- 2. pln_copy_appeal_has_curated_mipins
(
  'appeal_has',
  'odw_curated_db.appeals_has_curated_mipins',
  'odw.appeals_has_curated_mipins',
  'appeal_has',
  'appeal_has_curated_mipins',
  'BackOffice',
  true,
  20,
  true
),

-- 3. pln_copy_appeal_event_curated_mipins
(
  'appeal_event',
  'odw_curated_db.appeal_event_curated_mipins',
  'odw.appeal_event_curated_mipins',
  'appeal_event',
  'appeal_event_curated_mipins',
  NULL,
  false,                                            -- no dim_source_system SP
  30,
  true
),

-- 4. pln_copy_appeal_event_estimate_curated_mipins
(
  'appeal_event_estimate',
  'odw_curated_db.appeal_event_estimate_curated_mipins',
  'odw.appeal_event_estimate_curated_mipins',
  'appeal_event_estimate',
  'appeal_event_estimate_curated_mipins',
  NULL,
  false,
  40,
  true
),

-- 5. pln_copy_appeal_service_user_curated_mipins
(
  'service_user',
  'odw_curated_db.appeal_service_user_curated_mipins',
  'odw.appeal_service_user_curated_mipins',
  'service_user',
  'service_user_curated_mipins',
  NULL,
  false,
  50,
  true
),

-- 6. pln_copy_entraid_curated_mipins
(
  'entraid',
  'odw_curated_db.entraid_curated_mipins',
  'odw.Entraid_curated',
  'EntraID',
  'EntraID_curated_mipins',
  NULL,
  false,
  60,
  true
),

-- 7. pln_copy_nsip_project_to_mipins
(
  'nsip_project',
  'odw_curated_db.nsip_project',
  'odw.nsip_project_curated_mipins',
  'NSIP Project',
  'NSIP_curated_mipins',
  'NSIP Project',
  true,
  70,
  true
